author: ktf
body:
The following contains plain glibc 2.12.2 with TLS/thread-safety patch
on top. All the changes are contained within the dynamic loader, thus
package only includes only ld-2.12.2.so. ABI and API is not modified.

SCRAM tool file makes GLIBC_ROOT available in developer area for wrapper
scripts.

Compared to @davidlt original fix, this one is only built on linux.
title: Add plain glibc 2.12.2 + TLS/thread-safety patch dynamic loader
